title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields for Path, Type, etc. are displayed as text fields instead of labels. This makes the page look unappealing on all motif platforms.
EB: The fields for Path, Type, etc. should be displayed as readonly labels instead of text fields. This will improve the appearance of the page on all motif platforms.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and go to Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the readonly fields (Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as text fields.
